headline.main: OFFICER TELLS HERE OF SALERNO BATTLE; Says Soldiers Were Eager to Get Into Action in Italy

lead_paragraph: Lieut. William Cain, the first Coast Guard officer to return to this country after participating in the Italian invasion at Salerno, said yesterday that "the infantry bore the brunt of the action." He was interviewed at Coast Guard headquarters here, 90 Church Street.
abstract: Ger soldier being searched by US mil police, Salerno, illus
